name: Spooky Home Makeover
description:
This is a map made on 10/17/2021 basically based off of a Tycoon where you build and upgrade a structure using things that are collected overtime.

Run through the grass and collect planks alone or with friends to board up your windows and protect from the zombie ghouls, and ghosts.

Note: Such monsters only spawn AFTER 1 window has been boarded up or 5 planks have been added to the structure.

All Scripts, Assets, Models and even Textures are self made, custom generated or written myself.
